hm2TimeSyncMib.name: hm2TimeSyncMib
hm2TimeSyncMib.contactinfo: Postal: Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Phone: +49 7127 140 E-mail: hac.support@belden.com
hm2TimeSyncMib.description: Hirschmann Time Sync MIB. Copyright (C) 2011. All Rights Reserved.

HmSntpClientServerStatus.name: HmSntpClientServerStatus
HmSntpClientServerStatus.description: The status of the last received response from a configured server. other - None of the following enumeration values. success - The SNTP operation was successful and the system time was updated. requestTimedOut - An SNTP poll request timed out without receiving a response from the SNTP server. badDateEncoded - The time provided by the SNTP server was not valid. versionNotSupported - The SNTP version supported by the server is not compatible with the version supported by the client. This is indicated by the server returning a version later than the version configured for that server or a version of '0'. serverUnsychronized - The SNTP server is not synchronized with its peers. This is indicated via the 'leap indicator' field on the SNTP message. serverKissOfDeath - The SNTP server indicated that no further polls are to be sent to this server. This is indicated by a stratum field field equal to 0 in a message received from a server.
HmSntpClientServerStatus.reference: RFC 4330 - Simple Network Time Protocol (SNTP) Version 4 for IPv4, IPv6 and OSI; Section 4.

Hm2Ptp2LogSyncIntervalTc.name: Hm2Ptp2LogSyncIntervalTc
Hm2Ptp2LogSyncIntervalTc.description: Logarithm to the base of 2 of the mean synchronization interval.

Hm2Ptp2LogPdelayReqIntervalTc.name: Hm2Ptp2LogPdelayReqIntervalTc
Hm2Ptp2LogPdelayReqIntervalTc.description: Logarithm to the base of 2 of the minimum PDelay Request interval (used for p2p-delay).

PtpTimeInterval.name: PtpTimeInterval
PtpTimeInterval.description: The scaledNanoseconds member is the time interval expressed in units of nanoseconds and multiplied by 2^+16. Positive or negative time intervals outside the maximum range of this data type shall be encoded as the largest positive and negative values of the data type respectively. For example: 2.5 ns is expressed as: (hex) 0x0000 0000 0002 8000
PtpTimeInterval.reference: IEEE 1588-2008 Standard for a Precision Clock Synchronization Protocol for Networked Measurement and Control Systems

PtpTimeStamp.name: PtpTimeStamp
PtpTimeStamp.description: first 48 bit: seconds since 1.1.1970 last 32 bit: nanoseconds

PtpPortIdentity.name: PtpPortIdentity
PtpPortIdentity.description: The PtpPortIdentity type identifies a PTP port. The first 8 octets within this value specifies the ClockIdentity. The last 2 octets within this value specifies the port number. For example: '00 80 63 FF FF 00 00 00 00 01'. ClockIdentity is '008063FFFF000000' and port number is '0001'
PtpPortIdentity.reference: IEEE 1588-2008 Standard for a Precision Clock Synchronization Protocol for Networked Measurement and Control Systems

PtpClockIdentity.name: PtpClockIdentity
PtpClockIdentity.description: The PtpClockIdentity type identifies a PTP clock. The PtpClockIdentity shall be in the IEEE EUI-64 format. For example: '008063FFFF000000'
PtpClockIdentity.reference: IEEE 1588-2008 Standard for a Precision Clock Synchronization Protocol for Networked Measurement and Control Systems

PtpClockQuality.name: PtpClockQuality
PtpClockQuality.description: The PtpClockQuality represents the quality of a clock. The first octet represents the clock class. The second octet represents the clockAccuracy and the last two octets represent the offsetScaledLogVariance For example:
PtpClockQuality.reference: IEEE 1588-2008 Standard for a Precision Clock Synchronization Protocol for Networked Measurement and Control Systems

hm2SystemUtcTime.name: hm2SystemUtcTime
hm2SystemUtcTime.description: Time measured in seconds since 00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970. The clock of the device may be set using this variable.

hm2SystemTimeSource.name: hm2SystemTimeSource
hm2SystemTimeSource.description: Shows the source of the system time.

hm2SystemLocalTime.name: hm2SystemLocalTime
hm2SystemLocalTime.description: The current local time. This includes the timezone offset and if supported summertime offset. Measured in seconds since 00:00:00, January 1, 1970.

hm2SystemLocalOffset.name: hm2SystemLocalOffset
hm2SystemLocalOffset.description: The difference between the local timezone and UTC in minutes.

hm2SntpServerPort.name: hm2SntpServerPort
hm2SntpServerPort.description: The local port number used to listen for client requests.

hm2SntpServerOnlyIfSync.name: hm2SntpServerOnlyIfSync
hm2SntpServerOnlyIfSync.description: The SNTP server is enabled only if synchronized to another external time reference. (e.g. NTP or PTP).

hm2SntpServerStatus.name: hm2SntpServerStatus
hm2SntpServerStatus.description: Operational status of the SNTP server.

hm2SntpServerBroadcastAdminState.name: hm2SntpServerBroadcastAdminState
hm2SntpServerBroadcastAdminState.description: Enables/disables SNTP server broadcast admin mode.

hm2SntpServerBroadcastAddr.name: hm2SntpServerBroadcastAddr
hm2SntpServerBroadcastAddr.description: Destination address for SNTP broadcast or multicast.

hm2SntpServerBroadcastPort.name: hm2SntpServerBroadcastPort
hm2SntpServerBroadcastPort.description: The port number to send the broadcast packets to the clients.

hm2SntpServerBroadcastInterval.name: hm2SntpServerBroadcastInterval
hm2SntpServerBroadcastInterval.description: Interval of SNTP broadcast messages send in seconds.

hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlanTable.name: hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlanTable
hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlanTable.description: This table contains all VLANs used for SNTP server broadcast or multicast messages.

hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlanEntry.name: hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlanEntry
hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlanEntry.description: The SNTP broadcast server VLAN objects.

hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlan.name: hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlan
hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlan.description: VLAN used for SNTP server broadcast or multicast messages.

hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlanRowStatus.name: hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlanRowStatus
hm2SntpServerBroadcastVlanRowStatus.description: Indicates the status of an entry in this table, and is used to create/delete entries. Objects within this table can by changed while the status is 'active'.

hm2SntpClientAdminState.name: hm2SntpClientAdminState
hm2SntpClientAdminState.description: Enables/disables the SNTP client admin mode.

hm2SntpClientOperatingMode.name: hm2SntpClientOperatingMode
hm2SntpClientOperatingMode.description: Enables/disables SNTP client operating mode. In 'unicast' mode, the client sends a request to a designated unicast server and expects a reply from that server. In 'broadcast' client mode, it sends no request and waits for a broadcast from one or more broadcast servers.

hm2SntpClientDisableAfterSync.name: hm2SntpClientDisableAfterSync
hm2SntpClientDisableAfterSync.description: When set to 'enable' the SNTP client is disabled after the device is synchronized the first time successfully to a SNTP server.

hm2SntpClientRequestInterval.name: hm2SntpClientRequestInterval
hm2SntpClientRequestInterval.description: SNTP client request interval in seconds.

hm2SntpClientStatus.name: hm2SntpClientStatus
hm2SntpClientStatus.description: Overall operational status of the SNTP client.

hm2SntpClientBroadcastRecvTimeout.name: hm2SntpClientBroadcastRecvTimeout
hm2SntpClientBroadcastRecvTimeout.description: Time in seconds after the client in broadcast client mode will change the status from 'synchronizedToRemoteServer' to 'notSynchronized' if no broadcast packets are received.

hm2SntpClientServerAddrTable.name: hm2SntpClientServerAddrTable
hm2SntpClientServerAddrTable.description: This table contains objects to configure SNTP client connections.

hm2SntpClientServerAddr.name: hm2SntpClientServerAddr
hm2SntpClientServerAddr.description: The address of the external time server.

hm2SntpClientServerPort.name: hm2SntpClientServerPort
hm2SntpClientServerPort.description: The port number of the external time server.

hm2SntpClientServerDescr.name: hm2SntpClientServerDescr
hm2SntpClientServerDescr.description: The description of the server configured.

hm2SntpClientServerStatus.name: hm2SntpClientServerStatus
hm2SntpClientServerStatus.description: Status of the SNTP client - server connection.

hm2SntpClientServerRowStatus.name: hm2SntpClientServerRowStatus
hm2SntpClientServerRowStatus.description: Indicates the status of an entry in this table, and is used to create/delete entries. Objects within this table can by changed while the status is 'active'.

hm2NtpOperatingState.name: hm2NtpOperatingState
hm2NtpOperatingState.description: Operational status of the NTP server/client.

hm2NtpServerLocalClockStratum.name: hm2NtpServerLocalClockStratum
hm2NtpServerLocalClockStratum.description: The stratum to be used for the case that the server is only synchronized to the local clock

hm2NtpClientServerAddrTable.name: hm2NtpClientServerAddrTable
hm2NtpClientServerAddrTable.description: This table contains variables for each interface of the switch.

hm2NtpClientServerAddrEntry.name: hm2NtpClientServerAddrEntry
hm2NtpClientServerAddrEntry.description: This entry contains variables for each interface of the switch.

hm2NtpClientServerAddressType.name: hm2NtpClientServerAddressType
hm2NtpClientServerAddressType.description: Address type for external time server. Currently, only IPv4 and DNS is supported.

hm2NtpClientServerAddress.name: hm2NtpClientServerAddress
hm2NtpClientServerAddress.description: The address of the external time server.

hm2NtpClientServerPort.name: hm2NtpClientServerPort
hm2NtpClientServerPort.description: The port number of the external time server. Zero is not allowed as port number.

hm2NtpClientServerInitialBurst.name: hm2NtpClientServerInitialBurst
hm2NtpClientServerInitialBurst.description: The initial burst is intended to speed up the initial synchronization. Use with caution as it can cause a overload situation on the server.

hm2NtpClientServerBurst.name: hm2NtpClientServerBurst
hm2NtpClientServerBurst.description: The burst mode can be used to increase the precision on links with high jitter e.g. GSM/UMTS links

hm2NtpClientServerPrefer.name: hm2NtpClientServerPrefer
hm2NtpClientServerPrefer.description: The prefer flag can be used to mark the peer as preferred. Among a set of correctly operating peers, this one will be chosen as synchronization source.

hm2NtpClientServerStatus.name: hm2NtpClientServerStatus
hm2NtpClientServerStatus.description: Status of the NTP client server connection.

hm2NtpClientServerRowStatus.name: hm2NtpClientServerRowStatus
hm2NtpClientServerRowStatus.description: Indicates the status of an entry in this table, and is used to create/delete entries. Objects within this table can be changed while the status is 'active'.

hm2NtpClientListenAddrAddressType.name: hm2NtpClientListenAddrAddressType
hm2NtpClientListenAddrAddressType.description: Address type for external time server. Currently, only IPv4 and DNS is supported.

hm2NtpClientListenAddrAddress.name: hm2NtpClientListenAddrAddress
hm2NtpClientListenAddrAddress.description: The address of the external time server.

hm2NtpClientListenAddrPort.name: hm2NtpClientListenAddrPort
hm2NtpClientListenAddrPort.description: The port number of the external time server. Zero is not allowed as port number.

hm2NtpClientListenAddrStatus.name: hm2NtpClientListenAddrStatus
hm2NtpClientListenAddrStatus.description: Status of the NTP client server connection.

hm2NtpClientListenAddrRowStatus.name: hm2NtpClientListenAddrRowStatus
hm2NtpClientListenAddrRowStatus.description: Indicates the status of an entry in this table, and is used to create/delete entries. Objects within this table can by changed while the status is 'active'.

hm2PtpEnable.name: hm2PtpEnable
hm2PtpEnable.description: Enable or disable the Precision Time Protocol (PTP) on this node.

hm2PtpClockMode.name: hm2PtpClockMode
hm2PtpClockMode.description: This members value shall indicate which clock mode is used.

hm2PtpProfile.name: hm2PtpProfile
hm2PtpProfile.description: Configures PTP parameters to a specific profile. Setting the object to user-defined (1) has no effect.

hm2PtpIsSynchronized.name: hm2PtpIsSynchronized
hm2PtpIsSynchronized.description: If the clock is synchronized to the current Master this object is set to true. Otherwise it is set to false. The clock sets this object to true, if the offset (ns) to the current Master is less than hm2PtpSyncLowerBound. The clock sets this object to false, if the offset (ns) to the current Master is bigger than hm2PtpSyncUpperBound.

hm2PtpSyncLowerBound.name: hm2PtpSyncLowerBound
hm2PtpSyncLowerBound.description: This object defines when the hm2PtpIsSynchronized object is set to true. If the absolute value of the offset is smaller than hm2PtpSyncLowerBound, the hm2PtpIsSynchronized is set true. The value is interpreted as nanoseconds.

hm2PtpSyncUpperBound.name: hm2PtpSyncUpperBound
hm2PtpSyncUpperBound.description: This object defines when the hm2PtpIsSynchronized object is set to false. If the absolute value of the offset is bigger than hm2PtpSyncUpperBound, the hm2PtpIsSynchronized is set false. The value is interpreted as nanoseconds.

hm2PtpAbsMaxOffset.name: hm2PtpAbsMaxOffset
hm2PtpAbsMaxOffset.description: This members value shall indicate the absolute value for the maximum offset between its parent and this node. The value is set to zero if the offset is the first time smaller than hm2PtpSyncLowerBound. Offsets bigger than +/-1 second are indicated by the maximum value.

hm2PtpTimeSeconds.name: hm2PtpTimeSeconds
hm2PtpTimeSeconds.description: Current PTP time in PTP timescale

hm2PtpManagement.name: hm2PtpManagement
hm2PtpManagement.description: If set to true PTP management via PTP management messages is enabled.

hm2Ptp2TwoStepClock.name: hm2Ptp2TwoStepClock
hm2Ptp2TwoStepClock.description: A value of true indicates that this node is a two-step device.

hm2Ptp2ClockIdentity.name: hm2Ptp2ClockIdentity
hm2Ptp2ClockIdentity.description: This value is the clock identity of the local clock.

hm2Ptp2ClockQuality.name: hm2Ptp2ClockQuality
hm2Ptp2ClockQuality.description: Clock quality of the local clock.

hm2Ptp2ClockClass.name: hm2Ptp2ClockClass
hm2Ptp2ClockClass.description: First octet of hm2Ptp2ClockQuality. This represents the clock class of the local clock.

hm2Ptp2ClockAccuracy.name: hm2Ptp2ClockAccuracy
hm2Ptp2ClockAccuracy.description: Second octet of hm2Ptp2ClockQuality. This represents the clock accuracy of the local clock.

hm2Ptp2ClockVariance.name: hm2Ptp2ClockVariance
hm2Ptp2ClockVariance.description: Last two octets of hm2Ptp2ClockQuality. This represents the clock variance of the local clock.

hm2Ptp2Priority1.name: hm2Ptp2Priority1
hm2Ptp2Priority1.description: Priority 1 value of the local clock

hm2Ptp2Priority2.name: hm2Ptp2Priority2
hm2Ptp2Priority2.description: Priority 2 value of the local clock

hm2Ptp2DomainNumber.name: hm2Ptp2DomainNumber
hm2Ptp2DomainNumber.description: PTP domain number of the local clock.

hm2Ptp2StepsRemoved.name: hm2Ptp2StepsRemoved
hm2Ptp2StepsRemoved.description: The value of hm2Ptp2StepsRemoved is the number of communication paths traversed between the local clock and the grandmaster clock.

hm2Ptp2OffsetFromMaster.name: hm2Ptp2OffsetFromMaster
hm2Ptp2OffsetFromMaster.description: Current value of the time difference between master and slave measured by this clock.

hm2Ptp2MeanPathDelay.name: hm2Ptp2MeanPathDelay
hm2Ptp2MeanPathDelay.description: Current value of the mean propagation time (e2e-delay) between Master and Slave. This is only valid if hm2Ptp2DelayMechanism is set to e2e on the current slave port.

hm2Ptp2ParentPortIdentity.name: hm2Ptp2ParentPortIdentity
hm2Ptp2ParentPortIdentity.description: The port identity value of the port on the master that issues the synchronization messages used to synchronize this clock.

hm2Ptp2ParentStats.name: hm2Ptp2ParentStats
hm2Ptp2ParentStats.description: A value of True indicates that the objects hm2Ptp2ObservedParentOffsetScaledLogVariance and hm2Ptp2ObservedParentClockPhaseChangeRate are valid.

hm2Ptp2ObservedParentOffsetScaledLogVari.name: hm2Ptp2ObservedParentOffsetScaledLogVariance
hm2Ptp2ObservedParentOffsetScaledLogVari.description: Estimate of the parent clocks PTP variance observed by this clock.

hm2Ptp2ObservedParentClockPhaseChangeRat.name: hm2Ptp2ObservedParentClockPhaseChangeRate
hm2Ptp2ObservedParentClockPhaseChangeRat.description: Estimate of the phase change rate (drift) observed by this clock.

hm2Ptp2GrandmasterIdentity.name: hm2Ptp2GrandmasterIdentity
hm2Ptp2GrandmasterIdentity.description: ClockIdentity of the Grandmaster clock synchronizing this clock.

hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockQuality.name: hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockQuality
hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockQuality.description: ClockQuality of the Grandmaster clock synchronizing this clock.

hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockClass.name: hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockClass
hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockClass.description: First octet of hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockQuality. This represents the grand masters clock class.

hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockAccuracy.name: hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockAccuracy
hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockAccuracy.description: Second octet of hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockAccuracy. This represents the grand masters clock accuracy.

hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockVariance.name: hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockVariance
hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockVariance.description: Last two octets of hm2Ptp2GrandmasterClockQuality. This represents the grand masters clock variance.

hm2Ptp2GrandmasterPriority1.name: hm2Ptp2GrandmasterPriority1
hm2Ptp2GrandmasterPriority1.description: Priority 1 value of the grand master clock.

hm2Ptp2GrandmasterPriority2.name: hm2Ptp2GrandmasterPriority2
hm2Ptp2GrandmasterPriority2.description: Priority 2 value of the grand master clock.

hm2Ptp2CurrentUtcOffset.name: hm2Ptp2CurrentUtcOffset
hm2Ptp2CurrentUtcOffset.description: Current difference between the PTP timescale (TAI) and UTC in seconds.

hm2Ptp2CurrentUtcOffsetValid.name: hm2Ptp2CurrentUtcOffsetValid
hm2Ptp2CurrentUtcOffsetValid.description: A value of True indicates that the hm2Ptp2CurrentUtcOffset is known to be correct.

hm2Ptp2Leap59.name: hm2Ptp2Leap59
hm2Ptp2Leap59.description: A value of true indicates that the last minute of the current UTC day contains 59 seconds.

hm2Ptp2Leap61.name: hm2Ptp2Leap61
hm2Ptp2Leap61.description: A value of true indicates that the last minute of the current UTC day contains 61 seconds.

hm2Ptp2TimeTraceable.name: hm2Ptp2TimeTraceable
hm2Ptp2TimeTraceable.description: A value of True indicates that the current time is traceable to a primary reference.

hm2Ptp2FrequencyTraceable.name: hm2Ptp2FrequencyTraceable
hm2Ptp2FrequencyTraceable.description: A value of True indicates that the frequency determining the timescale is traceable to a primary reference.

hm2Ptp2PtpTimescale.name: hm2Ptp2PtpTimescale
hm2Ptp2PtpTimescale.description: A value of True indicates that the clocks timescale is PTP.

hm2Ptp2TimeSource.name: hm2Ptp2TimeSource
hm2Ptp2TimeSource.description: The source of time used by the Grandmaster clock.

hm2Ptp2PortTable.name: hm2Ptp2PortTable
hm2Ptp2PortTable.description: This table contains variables for each PTP2 port of the switch.

hm2Ptp2PortEnable.name: hm2Ptp2PortEnable
hm2Ptp2PortEnable.description: Enable or disable the sending and receiving / processing of PTP synchronization messages.

hm2Ptp2PortState.name: hm2Ptp2PortState
hm2Ptp2PortState.description: State of the PTP2 port instance.

hm2Ptp2LogDelayReqInterval.name: hm2Ptp2LogDelayReqInterval
hm2Ptp2LogDelayReqInterval.description: Logarithm to the base of 2 of the minimum DelayRequest interval used to measure the e2e-delay.

hm2Ptp2PeerMeanPathDelay.name: hm2Ptp2PeerMeanPathDelay
hm2Ptp2PeerMeanPathDelay.description: If hm2Ptp2DelayMechanism is set to p2p this value is an estimate of the current one-way propagation delay (p2p-delay).

hm2Ptp2LogAnnounceInterval.name: hm2Ptp2LogAnnounceInterval
hm2Ptp2LogAnnounceInterval.description: Logarithm to the base of 2 of the mean announce interval.

hm2Ptp2AnnounceReceiptTimeout.name: hm2Ptp2AnnounceReceiptTimeout
hm2Ptp2AnnounceReceiptTimeout.description: Announce receipt timeout in multiples of hm2Ptp2LogAnnounceInterval.

hm2Ptp2LogSyncInterval.name: hm2Ptp2LogSyncInterval
hm2Ptp2LogSyncInterval.description: Logarithm to the base of 2 of the mean synchronization interval.

hm2Ptp2DelayMechanism.name: hm2Ptp2DelayMechanism
hm2Ptp2DelayMechanism.description: This value indicates the propagation delay measuring option used by this port.

hm2Ptp2LogPdelayReqInterval.name: hm2Ptp2LogPdelayReqInterval
hm2Ptp2LogPdelayReqInterval.description: Logarithm to the base of 2 of the minimum PDelay Request interval (used for p2p-delay).

hm2Ptp2VersionNumber.name: hm2Ptp2VersionNumber
hm2Ptp2VersionNumber.description: PTP version in use on this port (always ptpVersion2).

hm2Ptp2NetworkProtocol.name: hm2Ptp2NetworkProtocol
hm2Ptp2NetworkProtocol.description: Current configured network transport protocol of this port.

hm2Ptp2V1Compatibility.name: hm2Ptp2V1Compatibility
hm2Ptp2V1Compatibility.description: If set to on all PTPv2 messages will be padded to the length of a PTPv1 frame. This is required by some hardware.

hm2Ptp2DelayAsymmetry.name: hm2Ptp2DelayAsymmetry
hm2Ptp2DelayAsymmetry.description: Asymmetry of the link connected to this port in nanoseconds. The hm2Ptp2DelayAsymmetry is positive when the master-to-slave propagation time is longer than the slave-to-master propagation time.

hm2Ptp2PortCapability.name: hm2Ptp2PortCapability
hm2Ptp2PortCapability.description: This object shows the capability of the ptp port.

hm2Ptp2VlanID.name: hm2Ptp2VlanID
hm2Ptp2VlanID.description: VLAN in which PTP packets are send. With a value of -1 all packets are send untagged

hm2Ptp2VlanPriority.name: hm2Ptp2VlanPriority
hm2Ptp2VlanPriority.description: VLAN priority of tagged ptp packets

hm2Ptp2TCClockIdentity.name: hm2Ptp2TCClockIdentity
hm2Ptp2TCClockIdentity.description: This value is the clock identity of the transparent clock.

hm2Ptp2TCDelayMechanism.name: hm2Ptp2TCDelayMechanism
hm2Ptp2TCDelayMechanism.description: Configures the transparent clock to be either a e2e- or p2p-transparent clock. If supported a value of e2e-optimized sets the clock to e2e mode where delay requests are only forwarded on the port where the current Master (hm2Ptp2TCCurrentMaster) is connected.

hm2Ptp2TCPrimaryDomain.name: hm2Ptp2TCPrimaryDomain
hm2Ptp2TCPrimaryDomain.description: PTP domain number of the primary syntonization domain.

hm2Ptp2TCSyntonized.name: hm2Ptp2TCSyntonized
hm2Ptp2TCSyntonized.description: A value of true indicates that the syntonization of the transparent clock is enabled.

hm2Ptp2TCNetworkProtocol.name: hm2Ptp2TCNetworkProtocol
hm2Ptp2TCNetworkProtocol.description: Current configured network transport protocol of the transparent clock.

hm2Ptp2TCCurrentMaster.name: hm2Ptp2TCCurrentMaster
hm2Ptp2TCCurrentMaster.description: The port identity value of the port on the master that issues the synchronization messages used to syntonize/synchronize this clock.

hm2Ptp2TCMultiDomainMode.name: hm2Ptp2TCMultiDomainMode
hm2Ptp2TCMultiDomainMode.description: If set to false, PTP messages from domains other than hm2Ptp2TCPrimaryDomain are ignored.

hm2Ptp2TCSyncLocalClock.name: hm2Ptp2TCSyncLocalClock
hm2Ptp2TCSyncLocalClock.description: Enable synchronisation of the local clock (TC hybrid mode). This requires syntonization to be enabled. All transparent clock operations are still done based on the syntonized clock.

hm2Ptp2TCOffsetFromMaster.name: hm2Ptp2TCOffsetFromMaster
hm2Ptp2TCOffsetFromMaster.description: Current value of the time difference between Master and this clock measured by this clock. This object is only valid if hm2Ptp2TCSyncLocalClock is set to true.

hm2Ptp2TCMeanPathDelay.name: hm2Ptp2TCMeanPathDelay
hm2Ptp2TCMeanPathDelay.description: Current value of the mean propagation time (e2e-delay) between Master and Slave. This object is only valid for e2e-transparent-clock and hm2Ptp2TCSyncLocalClock is set to true.

hm2Ptp2TCVlanID.name: hm2Ptp2TCVlanID
hm2Ptp2TCVlanID.description: VLAN in which PTP packets are send. With a value of -1 all packets are send untagged.

hm2Ptp2TCVlanPriority.name: hm2Ptp2TCVlanPriority
hm2Ptp2TCVlanPriority.description: VLAN priority of tagged PTP packets.

hm2Ptp2TCCapability.name: hm2Ptp2TCCapability
hm2Ptp2TCCapability.description: This object shows the capability of the TC.

hm2Ptp2TCPortTable.name: hm2Ptp2TCPortTable
hm2Ptp2TCPortTable.description: This table contains variables for each PTP2 TC port of the switch.

hm2Ptp2TCPortEnable.name: hm2Ptp2TCPortEnable
hm2Ptp2TCPortEnable.description: Enable or disable the sending and receiving / processing of PTP synchronization messages.

hm2Ptp2TCLogPdelayReqInterval.name: hm2Ptp2TCLogPdelayReqInterval
hm2Ptp2TCLogPdelayReqInterval.description: Logarithm to the base of 2 of the minimum PDelay Request interval (used for p2p-delay).

hm2Ptp2TCFaulty.name: hm2Ptp2TCFaulty
hm2Ptp2TCFaulty.description: True if port is in Faulty state.

hm2Ptp2TCPeerMeanPathDelay.name: hm2Ptp2TCPeerMeanPathDelay
hm2Ptp2TCPeerMeanPathDelay.description: This value is an estimate of the current one way propagation delay of a p2p-transparent-clock.

hm2Ptp2TCDelayAsymmetry.name: hm2Ptp2TCDelayAsymmetry
hm2Ptp2TCDelayAsymmetry.description: Asymmetry of the link connected to this port in nanoseconds. The hm2Ptp2TCDelayAsymmetry is positive when the master-to-slave propagation time is longer than the slave-to-master propagation time.

hm2IrigMode.name: hm2IrigMode
hm2IrigMode.description: Set the IRIG Mode, allowed values: (See https://wsmrc2vger.wsmr.army.mil/rcc/manuals/200-04/TT-45.pdf) irig-b000 (0) - Mode IRIG B000, BCDtoy, CF, SBS irig-b001 (1) - Mode IRIG B001, BCDtoy, CF irig-b002 (2) - Mode IRIG B002, BCDtoy irig-b003 (3) - Mode IRIG B003, BCDtoy, SBS irig-b004 (4) - Mode IRIG B004, BCDtoy, BCDyear, CF, SBS irig-b005 (5) - Mode IRIG B005, BCDtoy, BCDyear, CF irig-b006 (6) - Mode IRIG B006, BCDtoy, BCDyear irig-b007 (7) - Mode IRIG B007, BCDtoy, BCDyear, SBS with BCDtoy: binary coded decimal time of year BCDyear: binary coded decimal year CF: control functions SBS: straight binary seconds of day only modes b002,B003,B006 and b007 are supported.

hm2IrigTimeMode.name: hm2IrigTimeMode
hm2IrigTimeMode.description: Define the IRIG-B time base (UTC or local).

hm2IrigOperStatus.name: hm2IrigOperStatus
hm2IrigOperStatus.description: Current operational status of the IRIG-B output.

hm2IrigTimeQuality.name: hm2IrigTimeQuality
hm2IrigTimeQuality.description: Current IRIG-B time quality according to IEEE 1344.

hm2TimeSyncSntpSESIpv4PortNumberPairInUs.name: hm2TimeSyncSntpSESIpv4PortNumberPairInUse
hm2TimeSyncSntpSESIpv4PortNumberPairInUs.description: Indicates that the given IPv4 address / port number combination is already in use.

hm2TimeSyncSntpSESDnsPortNumberPairInUse.name: hm2TimeSyncSntpSESDnsPortNumberPairInUse
hm2TimeSyncSntpSESDnsPortNumberPairInUse.description: Indicates that the given DNS name / port number combination is already in use.

hm2Ptp2SynchronizationChange.name: hm2Ptp2SynchronizationChange
hm2Ptp2SynchronizationChange.description: This notification is sent if the PTP synchronization status is changed.

hm2SntpClientSynchronizationChangeTrap.name: hm2SntpClientSynchronizationChangeTrap
hm2SntpClientSynchronizationChangeTrap.description: This notification is sent if the SNTP synchronization status (hm2SntpClientStatus) is changed.
